---
id: accounts-get-accounts-account-id-balances
title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /accounts/{accountId}/balances endpoint"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /accounts/{accountId}/balances)```. **FamilyType**: ```Contas``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/578584735/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Contas+-+v2.4.1), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter."
sidebar_label: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /accounts/{accountId}/balances endpoint"
hide_title: true

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /accounts/\\{accountId\\}/balances endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/data/v2/accounts/{consentPactualId}/{pactualId}/{accountId}/balances"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /accounts/{accountId}/balances)```. **FamilyType**: ```Contas``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/578584735/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Contas+-+v2.4.1), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"accountId","description":"Identificador da conta de depósito à vista, de poupança ou de pagamento pré-paga.","schema":{"maxLength":100,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\\-]{0,99}$","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"pactualId","description":"The Data operation PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

No caso de conta de depósito a vista, sem considerar cheque especial e investimentos atrelados a conta. Expresso em valor monetário com no mínimo 2 casas e no máximo 4 casas decimais.","required":["amount","currency"],"type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"format":"double","description":"Valor relacionado ao objeto.","maxLength":21,"minLength":4,"pattern":"^-?\\d{1,15}\\.\\d{2,4}$","type":"string","example":"1000.0400"},"currency":{"description":"Moeda referente ao valor monetário, seguindo o modelo ISO-4217.","maxLength":3,"pattern":"^[A-Z]{3}$","type":"string","example":"BRL"}},"title":"AccountBalancesDataAvailableAmount"},"blockedAmount":{"description":"Saldo bloqueado, não disponível para utilização imediata, por motivo de bloqueio apresentado para o cliente nos canais eletrônicos. É esperado que a instituição informe a \núltima vez que capturou o saldo para compartilhamento no Open Finance. Dessa forma, \né possível que:\n- Caso a instituição capture dados de forma síncrona essa informação seja de poucos \nmomentos;\n- Caso a instituição capture dados de forma assíncrona essa informação seja de horas \nou dias no passado;\n- Quando não existente uma data vinculada especificamente ao bloco, se assume a data \ne hora de atualização do cadastro como um todo.\n\nDe toda forma, é preciso continuar respeitando o prazo máximo de tempestividade da API \nde Contas.\n"}},"title":"AccountBalancesData"},"links":{"description":"References to other resources of the requested API.","required":["self"],"type":"object","properties":{"self":{"format":"uri","description":"Full URI that generated the current response.","maxLength":2000,"pattern":"^(https:\\/\\/)?(www\\.)?[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\\+~#=]{2,256}\\.[a-z]{2,6}\\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\\+.~#?&\\/\\/=]*)$","type":"string","example":"https://api.banco.com.br/open-banking/api/v1/resource"},"first":{"format":"uri","description":"URI of the first page that originated this result list.
